Da game works fine.........
Burning method:
1º - Close all emulator or virtual units.
2º - Install Alcohol 120% 1.9.2 Build 1705
3º - Load first cd image.
4º - Choose securom *New(4x/5x) profile.
5º- Burn.

For play
1º- Enable in Alcohol Emulation RMPS (in emulation options)
2º Play :-)

Burning not needed 
1. Open Regedit
2. Go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESYSTEMMountedDevices
3. Right click the folder, and click PERMISSIONS.
4. Click on ADMINISTRATORS
5. Look for the READ box, and select DENY
6. Click OK
